title: Fixing PATH in fish with nix-darwin
description: Sharing how I fixed a PATH order issue when using Fish shell with nix-darwin. Since Fish reimplements macOS's path_helper behavior, it was reordering PATH and putting .nix-profile/bin at the end. By remembering the original PATH before Fish's initialization and restoring the order afterward, I got nix packages to properly override system binaries. I've included detailed debugging steps using Fish's event handlers in case others run into similar issues.
